detail_desc: Blouse in airy, patterned crêpe with a small, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with a scalloped lace trim. Unlined.
Trousers in a viscose and linen weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.
Wide trousers in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake back pockets and straight legs with creases.
Oversized, V-neck jumper in a soft, loose knit containing some wool and alpaca wool. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Straight-cut jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels, buttons at the front and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Leggings in jersey with a slight sheen. High waist with wide elastication.
Calf-length jersey dress with draped sides, short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and gathers at one side.
Print-patterned wellingtons with fabric linings and chunky rubber soles.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a lightly brushed finish. Deep V-neck, dropped shoulders, and slits in the sides.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a deep V-neck with pleats and covered buttons at the top. Gathers on the shoulders, long puff sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist and above the hem. Partly lined.
Straight-style, fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Wide, short top in soft organic cotton and modal jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in softly draping, patterned satin with a stand-up collar, V-neck opening with a concealed button at the front, and a concealed zip in one side. Long sleeves with double-layered, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Cycling shorts in airy, softly draping jersey with an elasticated waist.
Large scrunchie in an airy weave. Diameter approx. 14 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs that finish just above the knees with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Smocked bodice with a frill trim at the top, decorative buttons at the front and straight, ankle-length legs.
Soft non-wired bra in microfibre with lined cups, a racer back, elastic under the bust and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners. The polyamide in the bra is recycled.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. Side pockets, back pockets and a pocket on one leg.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a high waist, laser-cut edges and lined gusset. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the waist, bum and hips.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour panels.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and an opening with ties at the top. Gathered yoke at the top, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with decorative gathers front and back. Unlined.
Suede platform sandals with a braided jute trim around the soles and adjustable ankle strap with a metal fastener. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front approx. 4 cm, heel 4.5 cm.
5-pocket jeggings in washed, stretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Satin trousers with a high, pleated waist, side pockets, a concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in a crinkled cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch pockets at the sides and narrow elastication at the hems.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hat in a ribbed wool-blend knit containing some cashmere with a faux fur pompom on the top.
Leggings in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with an elasticated waist and raw-edge frills at the hems.
Trainers with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Leggings in lightweight cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Block-coloured cardigan in soft cotton knitted in different textured-knit styles with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fancy dress set with a unicorn Alice band and a pair of butterfly wings. Alice band with a glittery horn, glittery ears and flower appliqués. Wings with a glittery pattern, faux fur trim and elastic shoulder straps at the back.
Slip-on loafers in a jacquard weave with a decorative metal chain on the top. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in chiffon with a V-neck, lace-trimmed flounces and covered buttons down the front. Long sleeves with smocking and ties at the cuffs.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace yoke.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a rib knit with a V-neck at the front, deep V-neck at the back and gently flared skirt.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and a jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey pyjamas. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Loafers in imitation leather with a seam and decorative metal snaffle trim at the front. Satin linings made from recycled polyester, imitation leather insoles, and smooth soles. Heel 2.2 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a heavily draping jacquard knit. High waist with wide elastication.
Hat in a soft rib knit.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.

Shirt in easy-iron premium cotton with a cut-away collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the narrow cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Skirt in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and appliqués. Unlined.
Padded, sleeveless fancy dress costume in jersey.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups that maximise the bust for a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, lace detail at the back and a metal fastener at the front.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and detachable pile collar. Zip down the front, patch front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and a gathered seam at the back and down the sleeves. Appliqué on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Henley top in jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Lined, non-wired bikini top with flounces. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, press-studs down the front and along one leg, short sleeves and short legs.

Sleeveless dress in soft twill containing glittery threads with a lightly brushed finish. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on velvet ribbon and decorative bow, a concealed zip at the back and a flared skirt. Lined.
Top in smocked cotton jersey with elastication over the shoulders and short, elasticated puff sleeves in a broderie anglaise weave.
Pull-on jeans in stretch denim with elastication and a small frill at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets. Loose fit with gently tapered legs and elasticated hems.

Short dress in a lustrous weave with a V-neck and wrapover at the top with a concealed press-stud. Opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck, long cuffed sleeves with a slit running down, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

Short dress in chiffon crêpe with inset lace trims, an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with flounces at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Gathered seam and a wide flounce at the hem.
Cotton canvas boots with a rubber toe cap and ankle-high shaft. Lacing at the front, a loop at the back and imitation suede details. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Short cardigan knitted in a wool and alpaca blend for a soft, fluffy finish. V-neck, buttons down the front and long, voluminous sleeves that taper at the cuffs.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Turn-up at the hem with embroidered text on the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow straps and small metal rings at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with sparkly-stone appliqués, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved cardigans in soft, organic cotton jersey, one patterned. Buttons and a gathered seam at the top.
Socks in airy nylon with elasticated tops.
Nightdress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short, elasticated raglan sleeves and an elasticated neckline.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
